User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the application.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile image.

bio.description: A short biography of the user.

followersCount.description: The number of followers the user has.

followingCount.description: The number of users this user is following.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the user account was created.

chatIds.description: An array of chat IDs the user is a participant in.

followers.description: An array of user IDs who follow this user.

following.description: An array of user IDs this user follows.

friendRequests.description: An array of user IDs who have sent a friend request to this user.

acceptedFriends.description: An array of user IDs who are friends with this user.

Post.title: Post
Post.description: Represents a post created by a user.

fileUrl.description: Link to the file in Firebase Storage.

thumbnail.description: Optional thumbnail for video or photo posts.

userId.description: The ID of the user who created the post.

likes.description: The number of likes the post has received.

commentsCount.description: The number of comments on the post.

duration.description: Duration in seconds for music or video posts.

tags.description: Hashtags or categories for the post.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the post was created.

Chat.title: Chat
Chat.description: Represents a chat conversation between two or more users.

name.description: The name of the group chat.

participants.description: An array of user IDs participating in the chat.

lastMessage.description: The content of the last message sent in the chat.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the last message.

type.description: The type of chat, e.g., 'group' or 'private'.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the chat was created.

avatar.description: URL to the chat's avatar image (for group chats).

senderID.description: The ID of the user who sent the message.

replies.description: An array of message IDs that are replies to this message.

reposts.description: An array of user IDs who have reposted this message.

FriendRequest.title: FriendRequest
FriendRequest.description: Represents a friend request from one user to another.

status.description: The status of the friend request.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user.

definition.description: Stores all posts created by users.

params.name: postId
params.description: The unique identifier for the post.

definition.description: Stores metadata for each chat session.
Stores all messages for a specific chat.
Stores friend requests sent from one user to another.

params.name: toUserId
params.description: The ID of the user receiving the friend request.

params.name: fromUserId
params.description: The ID of the user who sent the friend request.
